attributes.long-description:
Dodge flamers breathing scorching fires and deactivate paralyzing Tesla machines as you guide wacky robots trapped in treacherous labyrinths to the exit! Plan each escape with precision as every single robot shares linked controls hindering a simple escape plan!

Put your creative flair into practice and design your own puzzling maps, sharing them with the online Robot Rescue community. Tackle the puzzles on your own or team up with a buddy in co-op mode! And if you are feeling a little competitive, then battle it out in Two Player split screen competitive mode! Unravel countless levels of challenging robotic fun in this unique and quirky puzzler!

• Venture through 3 exciting worlds with more than 100 maps to solve for hours of fun
• Design and share custom maps with players around the world
• Various interactive objects to aid in your escape or to entirely avoid
• Co-op mode and split screen competitive mode options within Two Player
• 10 trophies to add to your trophy collection

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item.

attributes.name: Robot Rescue Revolution
